titles.title: For the relief of Mohammed Manir Hossain, Ferdous Ara Manir, and Maish Samiha Manir.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Border Security, and Claims.

bill.summary: 5/22/2003--Introduced. Makes Mohammed Manir Hossain, Ferdous Ara Manir, and Maish Samiha Manir each eligible for issuance of an immigrant visa or for adjustment of status to that of a lawful permanent resident of the United States under the Immigration and Nationality Act, upon payment of the required visa fees.
